    • Field Detail

      • PARENT_RADIUS

        public static final double PARENT_RADIUS
        The starting radius of the parent circle for the stop. Because this is used for a reference, it must never be changed during run time!
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • latitude

        public double latitude
        The latitude and longitude (coordinates) of the stop.

      • longitude

        public double longitude
        The latitude and longitude (coordinates) of the stop.

      • parentRoute

        public Route parentRoute
        The parentRoute that this stop corresponds to.

      • stopID

        public java.lang.String stopID
        The ID of the stop. This is usually the stop name.

      • parentCircleOptions

        public com.google.android.gms.maps.model.CircleOptions parentCircleOptions
        The circle options that will be applied to the parent circle of the stop.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicStop

        public BasicStop(java.lang.String stopID,
                 double latitude,
                 double longitude,
                 Route route)
        Constructor for the BasicStop object. All that is required is the stopID, latitude, longitude, and route.
        Parameters:
        stopID - The ID of the stop. This is typically the name of the Stop.
        latitude - The latitude of the stop.
        longitude - The longitude of the stop.
        route - The route this stop corresponds to.

    • Method Detail

      • loadAllStops

        public static BasicStop[] loadAllStops(Route[] routes)
        Loads all the stops from the provided routes into an array of BasicStop objects.
        Parameters:
        routes - The routes to load the stops for.
        Returns:
        The array of all the stops for the routes provided.

      • addCircle

        public com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Circle addCircle(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                                          com.google.android.gms.maps.model.CircleOptions options,
                                                          boolean clickable)
        Creates and adds a parentCircle to the provided map with the provided circle options. It should be noted that this does not override the current parentCircle defined for this class, but rather just creates a new, unconstrained circle.
        Parameters:
        map - The map to add the parentCircle to.
        options - The circle options to apply to the circle. Note that this will not override what is set for the parentCircleOptions object in this class.
        clickable - Whether or not the circle should be clickable.
        Returns:
        The newly created parentCircle.

      • getCircle

        public com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Circle getCircle()
        Retrieves the parentCircle that corresponds to this stop. This may be null if the parentCircle was never created.
        Returns:
        The parent circle.

      • setCircle

        public void setCircle(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                      boolean clickable)
        Adds the parent circle to the map, as well as sets the objects parent circle. Using this method will default to the corresponding parentCircleOptions as opposed to something that is custom.
        Parameters:
        map - The map to add the parentCircle to.
        clickable - Whether or not the parentCircle should be clickable.
